titleStmt.title: Reasons why Sir Iohn Hotham, trusted by the Parliament, cannot in honour agree to the Treaty of pacification, made by some gentlemen of York-shire, at Rothwell, Sept. 29. 1642.
titleStmt.author: Hotham, John, Sir, d. 1645 Jan. 2.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
